posts.post_content: I love this card. I used to use it with [Ward of Piety](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ward of Piety) to redirect the damage done to him by creatures he removed onto other creatures, thereby giving him more fuel to kill further creatures with. While it's not a strong card, it's an interesting ability and it's fun to find ways to turn the drawback into an advantage.
